title: Mathematically speaking, Brand's W isn't avoidable unless you have over 400 movement speed
body:
Sure the Brand player can miss, but aiming center of mass basically guarantees a hit.

Math below:

Distance => Radius of W = 250  
Time => Delay = 0.625
Speed = Distance/Time
            = 250/0.625
            = 400

But wait, that only calculates the center of your champion, not accounting for unit size so generally you need even more than 400 movement speed to have a chance of dodging it.

Now that you know, don't get mad at your partner in lane when Brand is throwing W's left and right and they get hit by every single one.
